keyFacts: The document contains financial statements for accounts associated with Jeffrey Epstein.
It mentions repurchase agreements with Bear Stearns Co. Inc. as of the date of the statement.
The statement includes account balances and interest calculations for the period of January 1, 2004, to January 30, 2004.
There is a reference to a change in the commercial insurer for excess SIPC protection effective February 16, 2004.
The document is marked confidential and includes various financial transaction details.
